description: This file contains the implementation of the UserRepository class, which interacts with the database to perform CRUD operations related to User entities using Entity Framework Core.

classes.name: UserRepository
classes.description: An EF Core implementation of IUserRepository, responsible for data access related to User entities.

methods.name: GetByEmailAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a User by email asynchronously.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a User by ID asynchronously.

methods.name: AddAsync
methods.description: Adds a new User entity asynchronously.

methods.name: SaveChangesAsync
methods.description: Persists all changes to the database asynchronously.
